data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Aksu, Xinjiang Uygur, China will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Aksu, Xinjiang Uygur, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Aksu.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, move the 57,685 believers in the county of Aksu to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Aksu, Xinjiang Uygur, China. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Kazakh people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, encourage the disciples in Aksu, Xinjiang Uygur, China to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Aksu, Xinjiang Uygur, China that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Aksu, Xinjiang Uygur, China has a population of 760,400.

We estimate Aksu has 57,685 people who might know Jesus, 12,284 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 690,431 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Aksu, Xinjiang Uygur, China. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

location.name: Aksu
